info.name: Vireak Sok
info.title: UX/UI Designer
info.headline: Create digital design solutions that elevate your business and drive revenue growth by addressing your customers' needs
info.story: I began my university journey in 2018, majoring in Software Engineering, and graduated in 2022. During this time, my passion for visual design and user-centered problem-solving inspired me to transition from programming to UX/UI design. Currently, I focus on crafting minimalistic and modern user interfaces that leverage data-driven design principles to address user needs while driving meaningful business value.

latest_project.name: Wearable Fintech App
latest_project.desc: An application for wearable device users interested in the financial market, providing real-time updates on stock prices and exchange rates.

latest_project.name: Website Redesign
latest_project.desc: A landing page designed for target clients of Kirirom Digital Cambodia, showcasing and virtualizing the company’s services

latest_project.name: Paramedix
latest_project.desc: A mobile app that enables users to find medical services in their area, book appointments, or consult with specialists online

experiences.description: Initiated designs, handled feedback, and successfully delivered them to the development team for several mobile and web application projects — including Schedule Payment/Transfer, KHQR Dual Currency, Customer and Partner Management Portal, and more.

Led several impactful design projects in EdTech, including dynamic school landing pages and an innovative university search web app with intuitive interfaces that streamlined information accessibility and enhanced user engagement.

Crafted intuitive interfaces, conducted user research, and applied data-driven design decisions to deliver seamless user experiences — leading to increased user satisfaction and improved business outcomes.

Conducted customer research to understand user needs and created customer personas to ensure the design was equitable and enjoyable. Used Figma as the primary tool for wireframing and prototyping, along with Adobe software for graphic design.

Managed a Facebook page with over 2,000 organic followers and collaborated with the web development team to ensure usability. Participated in regular meetings with team leads and clients to understand audience needs and improve the service.

Collaborated with the management team to tailor embedded messages for the target audience, and planned, scripted, and edited promotional videos on various topics. Primarily used Illustrator for designing promotional posters and Premiere Pro for video editing.
